state_description: This screen provides a visual representation of disk space usage on the Macintosh HD. It allows users to explore different folders and their sizes, helping to identify large files and folders that may be taking up significant space.

enables.name: Select Folder
enables.description: Select a folder to view its contents and details.

enables.name: Remove Files
enables.description: Remove selected files or folders to free up space.

enables.name: Navigate Back
enables.description: Go back to the previous screen or view.

enables.name: Access Assistant
enables.description: Open the Assistant for help or additional options.
